entry.name: SpaceMarines/TechmarineDescription
entry.value: Technician and engineer as well as a full Astartes battle-brother.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TechmarineFlavor
entry.value: They learn how to divine the runes of engineering and study the liturgy of maintenance. This great body of lore must be committed to memory and understood by the novice Techmarine.
